Package com.clanboards

package com.clanboards
Core public API for the Clash of Clans Java client library.

This package provides a comprehensive Java client for interacting with the official Clash of Clans API. The library is designed for production use with features including automatic token rotation, rate limiting, and robust error handling.

Quick Start


 // Create client with HTTP transport and authenticator
 HttpTransport transport = new DefaultHttpTransport();
 Authenticator auth = new DevSiteAuthenticator(transport);
 CocClient client = new CocClient(transport, auth);

 // Login with developer credentials
 client.login("email@example.com", "password");

 // Fetch clan information
 Clan clan = client.getClan("#2PP");
 System.out.println(clan.getName());

Key Components

  • CocClient - Main API client and entry point
  • Clan, Player - Core data models
  • HttpTransport - Pluggable HTTP layer
  • Authenticator - Token acquisition strategy
  • TagUtil - Tag normalization utilities

Error Handling

The library uses specific exceptions for common API scenarios:

  • NotFoundException - Resource not found (HTTP 404)
  • PrivateWarLogException - Private war data (HTTP 403)

Thread Safety

The client and all data model classes are thread-safe and designed for concurrent use in multi-threaded applications.

Since:
0.1.0

    Rate limiting utilities for managing API request throughput.

    Token rotation utilities for distributing requests across multiple tokens.

    General utilities used across the client.

    Data models for clan wars, war logs, and Clan War League functionality.
